creditline: The Miscellaneous Works of Art Purchase Fund, 1956
portfolio: Temptation of St. Anthony, 1888, text by Gustave Flaubert
provenance: [Peter Deitsch Fine Arts, New York, until 1956; sold August 1, with 10 other lithographs from same book (P.12, 496-P.12, 506), for $350, to Mia]
title: ...d'abord une flaque d'eau, ensuite une prostituee, plate I from La tentation de Saint Antoine
